title: Deep Connection Pack
tagLine: Strengthen your bond through presence and shared experiences
description: A collection of rituals designed to deepen your connection through presence and shared moments of wonder.
howItHelps: These rituals help couples create meaningful connections by being fully present with each other and sharing experiences that spark joy and wonder.
semanticSummary: A pack focused on deepening emotional connection through presence and shared experiences

title: Joyful Togetherness Pack
description: A collection of rituals designed to bring playfulness and creative expression into your relationship.
howItHelps: These rituals encourage couples to explore new experiences together, fostering joy and creativity in their relationship.
semanticSummary: A pack focused on bringing joy and creativity into the relationship through shared experiences
